title: 崩溃！！！
author: 233a344a455
txt_content:
1.7.10forge+liteloder
先是输出Failed to write core dump. Minidumps are not enabled by default on client versions of Windows，崩了
看网上的用了 -XX:+CreateMinidumpOnCrash
还是崩溃，但报告不一样。。。
以下为用了-XX:+CreateMinidumpOnCrash的崩溃输出于log附件log,话说为何论坛无法直接上传.log

输出的后一段：

MC: [17:12:30] [Thread-8/WARN]: openmods.stencil.FramebufferHooks.createRenderbufferStorage(FramebufferHooks.java:23): Your potato failed to allocate nice buffer. No stencils for you. Cause: Invalid enum
MC: #
MC: # A fatal error has been detected by the Java Runtime Environment:
MC: #
MC: #  EXCEPTION_ACCESS_VIOLATION (0xc0000005) at pc=0x000000002bde1c40, pid=6088, tid=0x0000000000001d20
MC: #
MC: # JRE version: Java(TM) SE Runtime Environment (8.0_141-b15) (build 1.8.0_141-b15)
MC: # Java VM: Java HotSpot(TM) 64-Bit Server VM (25.141-b15 mixed mode windows-amd64 compressed oops)
MC: # Problematic frame:
MC: # C  [ig4icd64.dll+0x7a1c40]
MC: #
MC: # Core dump written. Default location: C:\Users\Peter\Desktop\minecraft 客户端\.minecraft\hs_err_pid6088.mdmp
MC: #
MC: # An error report file with more information is saved as:
MC: # C:\Users\Peter\Desktop\minecraft 客户端\.minecraft\hs_err_pid6088.log
MC: #
MC: # If you would like to submit a bug report, please visit:
MC: #   http://bugreport.java.com/bugreport/crash.jsp
MC: # The crash happened outside the Java Virtual Machine in native code.
MC: # See problematic frame for where to report the bug.
MC: #
MC: AL lib: (EE) alc_cleanup: 1 device not closed
[17:13:18] [ProcessMonitor/INFO] Process exit code: 1
[17:13:18] [ProcessMonitor/ERROR] The game exited abnormally, exit code: 1
[17:13:18] [ProcessMonitor/INFO] Process exit code: 1
[17:13:18] [ProcessMonitor/ERROR] 游戏非正常退出，请查看日志文件，或联系他人寻求帮助。 exit code: 1
[17:13:19] [ProcessMonitor/INFO] Launcher will not exit now.

replies.txt_content: 服务器问题的话输入这个/fml confirm
